dataPath_perServer.comment201: This provides the path to the shared google drive that has data for the system

config_perGitvServer.comment301: Provides configuration settings that depend on the Git branch of the system code
config_perGitvServer.comment302: and the server - the GIT branch and server are supplied by the administrator
config_perGitvServer.comment303: when the system is first started using [ node GITV:gitbranch SRVR:servername ]
config_perGitvServer.comment304: The system looks for an entry gitbranch+servername in the members of this list.
config_perGitvServer.comment305: and checks that the code branch being used matches the gitbranch name given above
